message: Hi {Name},

Just a couple of days are left to take advantage of your Pro priority access to our upcoming Justia Webinar, SEO for Law Firm Websites: Fundamentals of Citation & Link Building! On Friday, July 22, 2022 registration for any remaining seats in this program will be opened to all Justia Connect members.

Join us for this first of a two-part webinar in our series on effective SEO for law firm websites, as Justia CEO and SEO expert Tim Stanley explores the basics of the relationship between citations, link building, and Google Search results. This webinar will also cover internal and external linking strategies, such as gaining directory links, analyzing your backlink profile, disavowing troublesome links, and responding to Google penalties.
bottomline: Space is limited! Reserve your spot before it is too late.

message: Hi {Name},

We have you on our list and look forward to seeing you on August 3!
